name: Keepers of Truth Alpha group
description:
Story (not fully formed)

In this game, we are controlled by one of three agents, depending on the agent chosen, the level of difficulty varies and the gameplay is partially changed.

Control:
a, d - turn left, right, respectively. 

w, s - walking forward, backward.

left ctrl - aiming the weapon, k - shot.

esc - exit to the main menu.

Game process

Playing as an agent, you need to explore buildings in search of special items. Implemented only one room with 1 enemy.

Very important for me:

Ideas for the name of the organization, the characteristics of the agents, the history of the organization and other scenario solutions, if you wish, can leave in the comments. The best ideas I have chosen will probably be used in the game.
